comment.author: 18753752@N00
comment._content: The assassination of the Archduke was the spark that started World War I. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Archduke_Franz_Ferdinand_of_Austria Seen here posing with his children, Sophie, Maximillian, & Ernst.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Sophie was born in 1901, and Ernst in 1904. My guess is that the photo was taken between 1911 and 1913. www.btinternet.com/~J.Pasteur/Family.html has some pictures that could have been taken at the same time. The children are in the same outfits as far as I can see. Unfortunately the pictures are not dated. I found the same picture at news.webshots.com/photo/2045053910100532270PzIgGf -- also not dated. The other version has a printed caption and looks to be a page from a book.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See flickr.com/photos/mrsfujita/2763234472/ and flickr.com/photos/mrsfujita/sets/72157603564644040/ for more pictures of the Austrian royal family. flickr.com/photos/mrsfujita/2302560846/ has a date of 1913 and Ernst looks older than in this picture.

comment.author: 73508865@N07
comment._content: this picture was taken in 1911, Archduke Franz Ferdinand in the uniform of an admiral with his children Sophie (1901-1990) , Max (1902-1962) and Ernst von Hohenberg (1904-1954) www.bildarchivaustria.at/Pages/ImageDetail.aspx?p_iBildID...
